title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Park Film
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations     Park Film                Park Film - Legacy of a Landscape: Weir Farm              Legacy of a Landscape: Weir Farm   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:13 minutes, 37 seconds  Created in 2004, the 13-minute park film for Weir Farm National Historic Site gives visitors a brief overview on the national significance of the park and a glimpse into the lives of the artists and families that created and preserved this special place.
